meta.content: Greendale Schools will be closed effective Monday, March 16 to support social distancing and slow the spread of COVID-19. Â All Schools are closed and the buildings shut down until further notice...

span.font: Situated in the southwest metro area of Milwaukee, Greendale SchoolsÂ is home to more than 2,700 students. The district prides itself in providingÂ an excellent education for all students from Kindergarten through twelfthÂ grade.

a.span: Learn More & Register for School Finance 101

font.span: Greendale Schools will be closed effective Monday, March 16 to support social distancing and slow the spread of COVID-19.
All Schools are closed and the buildings shut down until further notice.Â

br.br: More information about the closing is on the webpage linked here.
